title: Scotch Permanent Fabric Tape Strips, Machine Washable, Perfect for DIY and Crafting (FAP-1-CFTP)
description: No sewing machine? No problem. Scotch Permanent Fabric Tape Strips empower you to make your fabric DIY and craft dreams come true! An ultra-strong, permanent adhesive in convenient cut-to-size strips gives you the benefits of a sewn seam without having to haul out the sewing machine! Your no-sew abilities get a major upgrade with a strong hold you can count on, from 3M, the leading company in adhesive technology, and Scotch Brand, the brand you can trust for all things sticky. Detailed instructions for use are included to make sure you can no-sew like a pro!
